00033 /**
00034  * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00035  * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00036  * @return SelfDoc
00037  */
00038 SelfDoc CNAnalysisMethodCNGender::explainSelf()
00039 {
00040     CNAnalysisMethodCNGender obj;
00041     SelfDoc doc;
00042     doc.setDocName(obj.getType());
00043     doc.setDocDescription(obj.getDescription());
00044     doc.setDocOptions(obj.getDefaultDocOptions());
00045     return doc;
00046 }

00048 /**
00049  * @brief Default Getter method for parameters and their documentation.
00050  * @return map of parameters and their descriptions.
00051  */
00052 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> CNAnalysisMethodCNGender::getDefaultDocOptions()
00053 {
00054   std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00055 
00056   // SelfDoc::Opt(name, type, value, default, min, max, description)
00057   SelfDoc::Opt opt1 = {"male-chrX-lower-threshold", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.8", "0.8", "0", "NA", "Male ChrX Lower Threshold"};
00058   SelfDoc::Opt opt2 = {"male-chrX-upper-threshold", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "1.3", "1.3", "0", "NA", "Male ChrX Upper Threshold"};
00059   SelfDoc::Opt opt3 = {"male-chrY-lower-threshold", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.8", "0.8", "0", "NA", "Male ChrY Lower Threshold"};
00060   SelfDoc::Opt opt4 = {"male-chrY-upper-threshold", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "1.2", "1.2", "0", "NA", "Male ChrY Upper Threshold"};
00061 
00062   SelfDoc::Opt opt5 = {"female-chrX-lower-threshold", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "1.9", "1.9", "0", "NA", "Female ChrX Lower Threshold"};
00063   SelfDoc::Opt opt6 = {"female-chrX-upper-threshold", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "2.1", "2.1", "0", "NA", "Female ChrX Upper Threshold"};
00064   SelfDoc::Opt opt7 = {"female-chrY-lower-threshold", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0", "0", "0", "NA", "Female ChrY Lower Threshold"};
00065   SelfDoc::Opt opt8 = {"female-chrY-upper-threshold", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.4", "0.4", "0", "NA", "Female ChrY Upper Threshold"};
00066 
00067   SelfDoc::Opt opt9 = {"mapd-threshold", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.5", "0.5", "0", "1", "MAPD Threshold"};
00068 
00069   opts.push_back(opt1);
00070   opts.push_back(opt2);
00071   opts.push_back(opt3);
00072   opts.push_back(opt4);
00073   opts.push_back(opt5);
00074   opts.push_back(opt6);
00075   opts.push_back(opt7);
00076   opts.push_back(opt8);
00077   opts.push_back(opt9);
00078 
00079   return opts;
00080 }

00082 /**
00083  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00084  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00085  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00086  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00087  *
00088  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00089  *
00090  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00091  */
00092 SelfCreate* CNAnalysisMethodCNGender::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00093 {
00094     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00095     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00096     CNAnalysisMethodCNGender* pMethod = new CNAnalysisMethodCNGender();
00097     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00098 
00099     pMethod->m_dMaleChrXLowerThreshold = setupDoubleParameter("male-chrX-lower-threshold", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00100     pMethod->m_dMaleChrXUpperThreshold = setupDoubleParameter("male-chrX-upper-threshold", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00101     pMethod->m_dMaleChrYLowerThreshold = setupDoubleParameter("male-chrY-lower-threshold", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00102     pMethod->m_dMaleChrYUpperThreshold = setupDoubleParameter("male-chrY-upper-threshold", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00103 
00104     pMethod->m_dFemaleChrXLowerThreshold = setupDoubleParameter("female-chrX-lower-threshold", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00105     pMethod->m_dFemaleChrXUpperThreshold = setupDoubleParameter("female-chrX-upper-threshold", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00106     pMethod->m_dFemaleChrYLowerThreshold = setupDoubleParameter("female-chrY-lower-threshold", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00107     pMethod->m_dFemaleChrYUpperThreshold = setupDoubleParameter("female-chrY-upper-threshold", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00108 
00109     pMethod->m_dMAPDThreshold = setupDoubleParameter("mapd-threshold", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00110 
00111     return pMethod;
00112 }

00114 /**
00115  * @brief Constructor
00116  */
00117 CNAnalysisMethodCNGender::CNAnalysisMethodCNGender()
00118 {
00119     m_dMaleChrXLowerThreshold = 0;
00120     m_dMaleChrXUpperThreshold = 0;
00121     m_dMaleChrYLowerThreshold = 0;
00122     m_dMaleChrYUpperThreshold = 0;
00123 
00124     m_dFemaleChrXLowerThreshold = 0;
00125     m_dFemaleChrXUpperThreshold = 0;
00126     m_dFemaleChrYLowerThreshold = 0;
00127     m_dFemaleChrYUpperThreshold = 0;
00128 
00129     m_dMAPDThreshold = 0;
00130 }
00131 
00132 /**
00133  * @brief Run the analysis.
00134  */
00135 void CNAnalysisMethodCNGender::run()
00136 {
00137     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodCNGender::run(...) start");
00138     isSetup();
00139 
00140     // This method is revised to use new methods available in the base class
00141     // CNAnalysisMethod for finding positions and other meta data on
00142     // probes in the probe vector got from getProbeSets.
00143 
00144     double dChrXMean = 0.0;  // Accumulate then divide to get the mean.
00145 
00146     // .first gives the start and .second gives one past the end.
00147     pair<int,int>chrX = getChrBounds(m_iXChromosome, getProbeSets());
00148     for (int i=chrX.first; i<chrX.second; i++)
00149     {
00150         CNProbeSet * pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(i);
00151         if (!pobjProbeSet->isPseudoAutosomalRegion())
00152         {
00153             dChrXMean += pobjProbeSet->getCNState();  // Accumulate
00154         }
00155     }
00156     dChrXMean /= getProbeSetCount(m_iXChromosome, getProbeSets());  // Divide the sum
00157     getExperiment()->setChrXMean((float)dChrXMean); // Save it
00158 
00159 
00160     // Chromosome Y is done the same as chromosome X.
00161     double dChrYMean = 0.0;
00162     pair<int,int>chrY = getChrBounds(m_iYChromosome, getProbeSets());
00163     for (int i=chrY.first; i<chrY.second; i++)
00164     {
00165         CNProbeSet * pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(i);
00166         if (!pobjProbeSet->isPseudoAutosomalRegion())
00167         {
00168             dChrYMean += pobjProbeSet->getCNState();
00169         }
00170     }
00171     dChrYMean /= getProbeSetCount(m_iYChromosome, getProbeSets());
00172     getExperiment()->setChrYMean((float)dChrYMean);
00173 
00174     // The rest is the same as the old version.
00175     // Follow the rules for gender calling the same as the old version.
00176     if ((dChrXMean >= m_dMaleChrXLowerThreshold) && (dChrXMean <= m_dMaleChrXUpperThreshold) &&
00177         (dChrYMean >= m_dMaleChrYLowerThreshold) && (dChrYMean <= m_dMaleChrYUpperThreshold))
00178     {
00179         getExperiment()->setCNCallGender(affx::Male);
00180     }
00181     else if ((dChrXMean >= m_dFemaleChrXLowerThreshold) && (dChrXMean <= m_dFemaleChrXUpperThreshold) &&
00182         (dChrYMean >= m_dFemaleChrYLowerThreshold) && (dChrYMean <= m_dFemaleChrYUpperThreshold))
00183     {
00184         getExperiment()->setCNCallGender(affx::Female);
00185     }
00186     else
00187     {
00188         getExperiment()->setCNCallGender(affx::UnknownGender);
00189     }
00190     if (getExperiment()->getMadDiffCN() >= m_dMAPDThreshold)
00191     {
00192         getExperiment()->setCNCallGender(affx::UnknownGender);
00193         Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: MAPD over threshold for " + Fs::basename(getExperiment()->getExperimentName()) + ", using CN2Gender call of 'unknown'.");
00194     }
00195     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodCNGender::run(...) end");
00196 }
00197 
00198 /**
00199  * @brief Run the analysis. (The old version of run commented out)
00200  */
00201 /*  Commented out on Dec 18, 2008 but left in for comparison.
00202     Feel free to delete if the above version is satisfactory.
00203 void CNAnalysisMethodCNGender::run()
00204 {
00205     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodCNGender::run(...) start");
00206     isSetup();
00207 
00208     double dChrXSum = 0;
00209     double dChrYSum = 0;
00210     int iChrXCount = 0;
00211     int iChrYCount = 0;
00212     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iRowIndex++)
00213     {
00214         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iRowIndex);
00215         if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == m_iXChromosome)
00216         {
00217             if ((!pobjProbeSet->isChrXPar1()) && (!pobjProbeSet->isChrXPar2()))
00218             {
00219                 dChrXSum += pobjProbeSet->getCNState();
00220                 iChrXCount++;
00221             }
00222         }
00223         else if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == m_iYChromosome)
00224         {
00225             if ((!pobjProbeSet->isChrXPar1()) && (!pobjProbeSet->isChrXPar2()))
00226             {
00227                 dChrYSum += pobjProbeSet->getCNState();
00228                 iChrYCount++;
00229             }
00230         }
00231     }
00232     double dChrXMean = (dChrXSum / (double)iChrXCount);
00233     double dChrYMean = (dChrYSum / (double)iChrYCount);
00234     getExperiment()->setChrXMean((float)dChrXMean);
00235     getExperiment()->setChrYMean((float)dChrYMean);
00236 
00237     if ((dChrXMean >= m_dMaleChrXLowerThreshold) && (dChrXMean <= m_dMaleChrXUpperThreshold) &&
00238         (dChrYMean >= m_dMaleChrYLowerThreshold) && (dChrYMean <= m_dMaleChrYUpperThreshold))
00239     {
00240         getExperiment()->setGender(affx::Male);
00241     }
00242     else if ((dChrXMean >= m_dFemaleChrXLowerThreshold) && (dChrXMean <= m_dFemaleChrXUpperThreshold) &&
00243         (dChrYMean >= m_dFemaleChrYLowerThreshold) && (dChrYMean <= m_dFemaleChrYUpperThreshold))
00244     {
00245         getExperiment()->setGender(affx::Female);
00246     }
00247     else
00248     {
00249         getExperiment()->setGender(affx::UnknownGender);
00250     }
00251     if (getExperiment()->getMadDiffCN() >= m_dMAPDThreshold)
00252     {
00253         getExperiment()->setGender(affx::UnknownGender);
00254         Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: MAPD over threshold for " + Fs::basename(getExperiment()->getExperimentName()) + ", using CN2Gender call of 'unknown'.");
00255     }
00256     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodCNGender::run(...) end");
00257 }
